1: The recent advancements in technology have not only transformed the way we communicate but have also significantly altered our daily routines and interactions with one another.
(1) Technology has had little effect on communication and daily life.
(2) Recent technological developments have changed communication and how we relate to each other.
(3) The advancements in technology have isolated individuals more than ever.
(4) Technology has primarily impacted only professional communication.
2: تشير الجملة إلى أن التقدم التكنولوجي غير طريقة التواصل وأثر على الروتين اليومي.
3: (1) غير صحيح، يعبر عن عكس المعنى.
(4) غير صحيح، يقيد التأثير على التواصل المهني فقط.
